dmca.title: New York Times Objects to Blogged Op-Eds
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam:

I am with the Legal Department of The New York Times Company, which publishes The New York Times newspaper, the websites and is the owner of the trademark "The New York Times" (registration number 227,904).

We recently learned of the existence of a website owned by Google. This website is publishing on a regular basis numerous articles from (see attached list of New York Times articles taken from links on ). All these New York Times articles can be found on www.nytimes.com.

This letter serves as The New York Times
